direction.raw_text: . TROLL MARKET - NIGHT 66 Troll Market is a steamy, medieval nightmare. A labyrinth of narrow alleys and foetid vapour. Trolls scavenge the crumbling, marble shoreline, picking through garbage, scattering vermin. Muddy water trickles down from above, forming cloudy puddles. Roaming vendors hawk exotic objects from every culture and century. At kiosks and shops, Trolls peddle cats (skinned or alive) cadres of Lovecraftian entities stroll about: Mer-men, Goblins and a few select species unknown to any cosmology. A dogfight of sorts is taking place in a small ring. Instead of pitbulls, multi-limbed creatures leap at one another while violent bettors laugh and shout. At the rail, Abe watches in horror, then sees a woman in rags making her way through the crowd. He catches a glimpse of her slippered feet... .which flash with pearls and gold embroidery. His curiosity aroused, he follows her.

direction.raw_text: Well, neither am I- BAMMMM!!!!! With a single uppercut, he sends it flying toward the ceiling, shoeless. The shop keeper watches in awe until it lands, about thirty feet away in the middle of the dogfight. The crowd scatters as the mongrel creatures attack the thing with blind instinct. Hellboy grabs the shop owner by the lapels and pulls him close. The shop owner's head rockets back and forth like a boxer's speed bag as HB "gently" slaps him around. Teeth fly everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feeling more chatty now??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's rumors! ... just- No- don't hit me, all right? There's talk of a revolt- a revolt against the human world- Hellboy releases him, then looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the hell is Abe?? He pushes his belt locator-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .,,,d 71 INT. TROLL MARKET ALLEY MAZE - NIGHT 71 The Princess has entered a shop selling MAPS and PRINTS. Abe stays outside, watching through a window as she negotiates to purchase a silver and crystal CYLINDER contained in a safety holding case. The SALESMAN denies it at first but after the Princess hands him a gold bracelet he finally acquiesces while vowing to her. He extracts the cylinder from its holding case and hands it to her. A red locator light flashes on Abe's utility belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Abe, gimme me your twenty-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm following a lead, Red. Keep your locator -. A large TROLL cuts him off-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me- What do you think you're doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you in trouble? Talk to me, Abe. Another TROLL comes up behind Abe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think you- The TROLL opens a small wooden box and extracts a nasty looking Insect: A NARCOTIC BUG.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my- The second TROLL loads the buzzing bug - like a bullet - into a blowpipe. Abe turns just as he blows. The bug lands on Abe's chest and sinks its stinger deep into his flesh. He groans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe? What's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe tears it loose and crushes it underfoot. But his vision blurs, he staggers forward and falls, face first, onto the cobblestones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe? Come in - Abe? Dammit -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SHOP - SAME 72 The locator's blue light dims; concerned, Hellboy and Johann look at each other. Seeing his chance, the shop keeper melts away into the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAP SHOP - LATER 73 Abe opens his eyes and slowly gets up. He looks around: he's surrounded by racks of ancient scrolls and musty books. The door is locked. Instinctively he looks for his belt- It's not there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you are looking for your weapons, my guards took them. Abe turns to face the Princess, who stands only a few feet away. She has cast off her dingy cloak and is radiant in fine silk robes. She is feeding slices of fruit to a cage of large, featherless REPTILE/BIRDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - I carry no weapons, madam- I assure you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why were you following me? Abe is ashamed to realize the real answer. He's utterly beguiled by her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you seeking to join my brother?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your brother-??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In his revolt against the humans?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A revolt? No, no, no, I- You are sorely mistaken... He takes a step forward but the YRDRIG comes out of nowhere, barking and growling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then answer me truthfully- Why were you following me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Abe Sapien -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is no such name!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Horrible- I know- but- Please, hear me, I beg you. I am an agent of the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense. If we can assist you-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me your hand. Abe complies, thrilled as she runs her fingers over his palm. The Princess' face brightens. She smiles and gestures for the YRDRIG to yield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Down Yrdrig - he's a friend. The YRDRIG jumps on Abe and starts licking him with all three tongues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yrdrig's really just a puppy. The drooling beast pins Abe to the floor with one paw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice puppy... A The YRDRIG lifts Abe with one of its mouths and gives him playful shake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father gave him to me. Yrdrig, leave our guest alone- The Yrdrig drops Abe onto the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Out! Out! Bad Yrdrig! As the animal skulks away, she helps Abe up-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bows her head) My name is Princess Nuala.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bows his head) Your highness, the honor is all mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I apologize, Mr. Sapien, for the manner in which we brought you here... couldn't be too sure. She offers him the locator belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, it was nothing. Love the puppy,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And under diplomatic immunity - may I seek asylum??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We would be... honored, I'm sure. But, may I ask: from whom do you seek asylum? Suddenly, a COMMOTION outside. The door flies off its hinges. Hellboy and Johann burst in, leaping over a pile fallen guards outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red, no! I'm all right! The Princess shrinks back, but Abe motions for calm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen! Some respect, please! The Princess looks with dismay at her vanquished bodyguards. The NARCOTIC BUGS buzz around HB, who swats them like mosquitoes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that was my royal guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red, apologize at once! We are in the presence of... royalty! Hellboy's never heard Abe sound like this- giddy as a schoolboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Abe) You're vouching for her, I take it. Mr Sapien?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, most definitely. She's from an ancient, noble line -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - of warriors. The Children of the Earth. (to the Princess) I'm sorry, Princess Nuala. With such a fierce bloodline, we cannot take your claim of allegiance at face value. He produces the ANCIENT SEAL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAPMAKERS VESTIBULE - LATER 74 Standing at a long deal table, the Princess lights a candle and examines the ancient seal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Human side, two nights ago- The Princess studies their faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In ancient times a seal like this was delivered to the enemy as a declaration of war. A signal from the underground realm to the entire world. It prefaced the awakening of the Golden Army- Johann sits down heavily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I feared as much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Johann) What-? What-? A goblin army-? Johann shakes his glass head, overcome with worry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Golden Army. The unstoppable tide. There has been nothing to substantiate such a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a tale- At the dawn of time... Even before the great flood, man and the Children of the Earth shared this planet... (she sighs) But as man in his greed expanded his dominion, there ensued a bitter war...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MYTHICAL BATTLEFIELD - DUSK 75 Silhouetted against a crimson sky, the shadows of thousands upon thousands of goblins, elves and fairies do battle with hordes of men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D) In those days, my people were led by my Father, King BALOR, the one-armed king of Elfland.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fights valiantly at the side of his son, the tall, pale elf knight: PRINCE NUADA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V. 0.) (CONT'D) The bloodshed went on year after year. Many lives were lost. An overview of the battlefield fades as the sun sinks below the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THRONE ROOM - DAY 76 Seated in an 'opulent throne room, KING BALOR addresses a wretched guild of deformed goblins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) It was then that the King ordered the Sigri to build him a new, invincible army.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BLACKSMITH FURNACES - DUSK 77 Lit by the fires of a hundred furnaces, stoked by scores of goblins, a MECHANICAL ARMY is born. Metal plates and moving parts are hammered into shape on enormous anvils and bolted onto tall, ornate, golden figures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) This was an army that would not eat, drink or grow tired. A heartless, ruthless force made of the purest metal, mined from the depths of the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COURTYARD, CASTLE - DUSK 78 In perfect ranks, in eerie unison, the golden soldiers line up, filling the entire courtyard, awaiting the King's command.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) The Sigri worked until the winter moon was high in the sky - The CHIEF GOBLIN BLACKSMITH displays three curved segments of gold. He fits them together and holds a completed CROWN directly over the King's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am King Balor, leader of the Golden Army. Is there anyone here who disputes my right??? Silence. Prince NUADA kneels next to his father. The Goblin crowns the King, who lifts his sword. In response-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!! The new army raises its lances, hailing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HUMAN ENCAMPMENT - NIGHTFALL 79 As the humans make ready for battle, a tremor shakes the earth. They turn their gaze to the horizon, which bristles with the arms of the approaching troops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BATTLEFIELD - CONTINUOUS 80 The fight is brutal. The mechanical soldiers mow down the humans by the hundreds, their swords replaced as needed by battle axes, bludgeons and lances.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) But this army knew no bounds, had no remorse, felt no loyalty, engaging in blind battle with man, woman or child. The horde crushes everything, with swords slicing through armor as if it were paper. Every blow is deadly, precise. The army marches ever onward, like a grinding machine devouring tender flesh. At length, there is no sign of life in the human camp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D) And as the king gazed upon the earth awash in blood and at the impassive metal faces of the army he had created, his heart grew heavy. Victory was gained at too high a price. This war should never have been waged. The King surveys the carnage. The mechanical soldiers stand in symmetrical ranks awaiting further instructions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D) And so he arranged a truce: the surviving men would keep to their cities and we children of the Earth would dwell within the forests. This pact, he declared, would be honored by our sons and the sons of their sons until the end of time. Listening to his father, Prince Nuada reacts with anguish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) (CONT'D) But my brother did not believe in the promises of men. He marched off into exile, vowing to return if the Sons of the Earth ever needed him. Prince Nuada walks away towards a dying sunset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STORAGE CHAMBER - NIGHT The goblins lock the golden army into a huge cavern, under the light of ten thousand flickering torches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) And the golden army was ordered to lie dormant, locked inside the earth itself - and there it is to this day, waiting for the wearer of the crown to command it again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MAPMAKER'S SHOP - NIGHT 82 The Princess finishes her tale. Hellboy and Johann look at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is that crown??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father had it destroyed. Cut into three pieces. One for mankind... She holds up her piece of the puzzle, which dangles from a chain around her neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .Two for the sons of the Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, you do need our help..?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid it's the other way around. She holds the CYLINDER she purchased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The location of the Golden Army is contained within this cylinder-- She opens it and produces a parchment hidden inside. She extends it: the map just shows three coordinates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a global chart, Edo - that's the old name for Tokyo - Moscow, and Renvyle here-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But nothing else- She rolls back the map into the cylinder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So far, this is a family matter. To intervene will bring nothing but trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, I like trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TROLL MARKET NARROW PASSAGES - NIGHT 83 The Princess leads the group through the surging, noisy crowd of bizarre creatures. Hellboy, Johann and Abe bring up the rear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No- not that way. Too risky- They're lost in unfamiliar alleys and byways. Until-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (finally, pointing) There. Stairs to the street...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold! The Prince appears at the top of the stairs, dressed in black. He's surrounded by his elite guard. Stepping to the rail, he points at his sister and addresses the crowd:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hear me, o creatures of the forest! Can you recognize a traitor? She's here to betray her own! He casts a disdainful look at Hellboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm here to recruit all of you against the humans. Make your decision now. Those who join me will be rewarded. The rest... will be killed. A sudden silence falls over the throng. Then, the sound of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Everyone looks at Hellboy, who is unclenching his fists and stretching his neck. He starts up the stairs, but a couple of the GUARDS leap down to block his path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna put this as delicately as I can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BOWLING ALLEY - SAME A crowded BOWLING ALLEY is full of serious-looking players in colorful shirts and shoes. Someone rolls a ball down the center lane, and as it speeds right at the pins...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out, Manny! Strike city..!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Hellboy erupts from under the floorboards, fighting the clawing monsters right behind him! As the bowlers freeze in shock, dozens of creatures pour out into the human world. Grunting, Hellboy punches his way free, only to be dragged back by the tail by WINK. Abe, shielding the Princess, demonstrates the way of the water, a fluid martial arts display. He ducks and parries the blows, leaping like Nureyev. Abe scoops up a couple of bowling balls and rolls them at the Prince's guards. He manages to knock a couple off their feet. As they get back up, he uses the available bowling pins as clubs. The screaming PATRONS rush for the doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STREET -- CONTINUOUS Outside, the civilians flee, but the news crews come is back. He running. As their lights blaze up, REPORTER 2 gapes in disgust: Hellboy's massive hands are wrapped around the neck of a sweet little OLD LADY! He beats her mercilessly!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help me...! Please, somebody..!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to his cameraman) Oh, my God!! Oh, my- Roll! Roll on this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not what you think -!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pointing at HB) He's lost his mind! He's worse than any of them..!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to Hellboy, revealing that the old lady is actually
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Liz runs over with a prism from the SCHUFFTEIN GOGGLES and sticks it in front of the camera lens, revealing the truth. The reporter checks his monitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the BPRD team, including Liz, is swept up in this fight. The denizens of the troll market overturn parked cars and knock down lamp posts, ROARING with excitement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fire is not my enemy-- it is a part of me-- Liz yells out a warning... and then throws a barrage of flaming bolts. A pair of crab-like THINGS shrivel and burn. Johann melds with a heavy steel dumpster, until only his legs are visible beneath it. Bending at the waist - SPLAT - he brings it down on the head of the nearest creature!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and HB duke it out for a few beats and then HB finally vanquishes the Troll, Ripping his Iron Mace off and throwing it away. As the other monsters retreat... .the PRINCE appears: in his hand a complex mechanical
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Immediately worried, Abe hustles the Princess over to the BPRD truck. The Prince twists a timer. His bloodied trolls disperse, screaming, renewing the panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) I will find you, young daemon - (to Nuala) - and you, too, my sister. Meanwhile, here's a taste of what lies in store.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He throws the grenade. Hellboy dives, just in time to catch it. He's about to throw it down a sewer, when he listens to its clockwork innards then: PING!!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a dud, your royal assness - ! The Prince has disappeared, along with his horde.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you like that? Just when I was loosening up. Then... CLACKK!!!. Hellboy scrutinizes the grenade as it opens up like a beans. flower... and spews out a handful of Brightly colored
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pick them up!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe. relax- It's jumping beans... Abe is scrambling to retrieve them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do as I say! With a sigh, Hellboy scoops up a few.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many do you have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three, how about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three! There's always seven! Find the last one!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The seventh bean is next to a manhole. It hops closer edge...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quick, it's going for water! Hellboy reaches for it... but it's too late. The thing hops into the manhole and lands somewhere below with a SPLASH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God, evacuate the area!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe, please, get a grip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from below their feet. WHAMMMM!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: punches up through the pavement, overturning cars, knocking buildings off their foundations and ripping up through the Bridge overpass!! Picking up speed, the tree branches soar up, up, up... into the moonlit clouds. Hellboy approaches the massive, trunk, gazing up in fascination. Birds and creatures emerge from the inside and flutter around, grass overtakes pavement- and for a moment Chinatown looks like the Garden of Eden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa. Just like the story books. Manning and Liz take a few steps into it: a SQUIRREL-BEING climbs on Liz's shoulder and a couple of IRIDESCENT HUMMINGBIRDS fly around her "ala" SNOW WHITE. A small crowd starts wandering into this idyllic scenario.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is so beautiful-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So- perfect- so peaceful-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!!! He spots. the prince, at the base of the tree. Knocking on it-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey- Jhonny Apleseed- What are you-?? Oh- Jeez did you have to do that?? Liz starts pulling Manning away and yelling at the crowd-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back- Go back- right now!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? What? What is he doing-?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's knocking on wood- summoning an
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An elem-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A forest spirit that lives in that tree. He's releasing it-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, and is it that bad??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!!!! The tree trunk rumbles and shakes under some enormous force. Huge LEAVES tumble to the street. Even the ever-present NEWS CREWS back away as a huge shape descends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !! the trunk rips in two, revealing a curled, dormant
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Five stories high- Fierce as nature. THE ELEMENTAL steps out of the tree and stares at Hellboy. Uttering a weird, guttural SOUND, the Giant raises an arm and pulverizes a GASOLINE TRUCK!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Flames leap up! The Elemental grins with delight, turning his baleful gaze on the Princess. As she shrinks back, her pet Yrdrig rushes at the thing, snarling. In a single leap, it sinks its teeth into the Elemental's heel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good dog. (to Elemental) Now, Woody... You want to fight someone, you fight with me. Hellboy humorously adopts a kung fu pose, as in Bruce Lee. The Elemental hops forward, New branches sprout from his limbs, shaking the Yrdrig off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Princess) This may not be the best place for you, your majesty. With your permission... He offers the Princess his arm. She takes it and allows Abe to lead her away. A moment later, the Elemental smashes the ground where they had been standing! Every time the ELEMENTAL moves, he trails behind roots and branches. The roots connecting to its feet and leading to the original tree trunk, like an umbilical cord. Johann sees this-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a plan- He looks at Abe-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -as the fishman helps the Princess up into the rear of the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: garbage truck. Up front, behind the wheel, Liz starts the engine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy climbs a fire escape as the Elemental's arm/branches extend and grow over the ladder, pulling it down below his feet. Hellboy ducks into one of the open windows as the Elemental tears away the rest of the scaffolding. Growing and discarding branches and roots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ABANDONED BUILDING - CONTINUOUS 89 Hellboy runs like a cockroach through a dilapidated KITCHEN. Behind him, the Elemental's massive BRANCH/FIST crashes through the wall, then pursues him as he runs down a corridor littered with debris. Like a wrecking ball, the Elemental demolishes each section of the corridor as Hellboy runs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LEDGE - CONTINUOUS 90 Hellboy steps out onto a ledge ten stories up, just out of reach of the Elemental.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Elemental) What now, Big Boy? You get a ladder? The Elemental jumps up and down, trying to reach him, barking in frustration. Hellboy's RADIO crackles:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on the radio)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ? This is Blue. The Princess is fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, lead him to the bridge. Hellboy looks over the buildings and sees the Brooklyn Bridge in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's nine blocks from here, Fishbowl!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll figure it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's at the bridge? Abe - ? Liz? Hello??? No answer. Muttering, Hellboy climbs higher, up a buzzing neon sign reading "Hotel". The Elemental smashes the letters "tel"... so Hellboy climbs the "0" to the roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GARBAGE TRUCK - SAME 91 Liz drives the garbage truck toward the Brooklyn Bridge. Johann is sitting next to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROOFTOP - CONTINUOUS 92 Hellboy makes a running start and leaps off the building. He sails over the alley, reaches for the approaching cornice... and almost loses his grip! He hangs on for dear life. Behind him, the Elemental appears, climbing onto an adjacent roof. As his feet smash through the skylights, the Elemental pulls down a WATER TOWER. A wall of water rolls toward Hellboy, like an ocean wave! Hellboy leaps to the next roof... and the water shoots over the edge of the building, cascading onto the street below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONSTRUCTION SITE - SAME 93 Liz parks the truck near the Brooklyn Bridge. Using binoculars, Abe peers out the back doors to see Hellboy bringing the Elemental closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johann - they're almost here. Johann moves among massive construction machinery. He stops at a stack of heavy SPOOLS OF CABLE. Abe comes running, pointing at the cable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. I had the very same idea... He gets behind the levers and handles of a complex machine which holds a half mile of steel cable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gazing at the controls) .but how do you operate this??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you'll permit me... Johann opens his fingers, and plunges both arms deep into the mechanism! Instantly, the diesel engine STARTS UP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Abe) Stand back, Abe. A hydraulic strut lifts the spool, then pitches it through the air, spinning off 300 yards of cable. It splashes down near the far shore of the East River.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, tie it onto the pontoons on the other side. (seeing Hellboy coming) Quickly, Abe!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe races down a pier and dives smartly into the dark water. Then he surfaces, surging dolphin-like toward the Manhattan shore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DOCKS 95 Hellboy makes it to the bridge... as, behind him, the Elemental wades into the river, pushing aside boats and barges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe makes it to the other side, surfacing with the cable, towing it to a half-submerged pontoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on the radio) Macht schnell! Abe - make it fast! The cable is a yard short of the anchor point! Abe tugs on
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need more!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more available! The Elemental's feet stomp through the river; he stumbles as he encounters the submerged cable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clinging to the cable, Abe is dragged down, down down... past rusting cars, oil drums... and a couple of rotting
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: their feet in tubs of cement! Suddenly, Abe's head strikes a sunken truck, knocking him unconscious. Blood seeps from his wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Hellboy climbs one of the bridge towers, he hears someone calling out from above:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) Haven't you managed to kill it yet? You, who were so eager for a fight? The Prince is standing on top of the tower. He points at Hellboy, then yells at the Elemental.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Elemental) Over here, dear friend...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Elemental plucks Hellboy off a parapet! Hellboy wriggles in the massive wooden finger-like appendages.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TOKYO STREETS - NIGHT 122 News footage of the Ginza features YOKAI GHOSTS on a rampage, destroying the stores and attacking salarymen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a news alert. Tokyo is under assault - repeat - this city has been attacked. Monstrous beings, defying description, have waded into the Ginza- The jumpy, handheld images are full of digital interference. The spectral BEASTS drag down power lines and hurl cars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - where police are helpless and hospitals overwhelmed. One moment, please. Moscow... come in, Moscow...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOSCOW STREETS - SAME 123 Red Square, Moscow now seen in similar, shaky video. Hundreds of citizens are running from a towering, DRAGON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is CNN in Moscow, where a Dragon has laid claim to Red Square. Yes- a DRAGON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The DRAGON heads towards the TV REPORTER and screeching, it raises its PAW.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: goes down, then the picture winks out. Black screen. The HISS of static...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: off the monitor to Jay Leno, who sits in stunned silence, like everyone else. Finally, he looks over at Hellboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Friends of yours?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No -!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then, may I ask what you're doing here? Shouldn't you be out protecting humanity instead of hooking up with our women? At last, Hellboy explodes. Bellowing, he rips up the desk and throws it through the backdrop!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD - SAME The Princess snaps off the TV, looking worried. Alone with her thoughts, she examines the curved gold piece hanging from a chain around her neck. She closes her eyes and shudders - trouble is near. The Yrdgrig wakes up and whimpers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD CORRIDOR - CONTINUOUS Video cameras record the journey of the Princess as she makes her way through the nearly-deserted corridors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LIBRARY -- CONTINUOUS 126 A VIDEO surveillance camera in the BPRD library records the Princess as she crosses to Abe's tank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She hides the gold segment within the pages of "Jane Eyre." At that moment, the Yrdrig GROWLS -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhh, it's all right -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! A jolt shakes the room. A-moment later, a wall collapses as warty, heavily muscled ARMS and FINGERS tear at the masonry! in seconds, a squad of TROLLS pulls itself into view! WINK leers at the Princess. From her waistband, she produces a long, thin DAGGER and wields it timidly. Somewhere in the building, ALARMS start clanging. The Yrdrig shakes himself into action and springs. With a SNARL, it attaches its several jaws onto the nearest trolls. As the fighting creatures crash into the spiral staircase, the Princess hears a familiar voice:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold. The Prince steps into the room, carrying a long spear. The trolls are on top of the Yrdrig, ready to kill him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come-! The trolls release the Yrdrig and bound over to the Prince. The last troll, however, grabs the Yrdrig by the neck and brutally twists -! The animal's three mouths yelp and cough, fighting for air. - the It thrashes pathetically until, suddenly, it's over beast is dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is your sense of shame? You mingle with... the liars?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD GARAGE - SAME 127 ALARMS are ringing as the Hummers pull into the underground parking garage. Manning and Hellboy jump out of their vehicle and see -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - a couple of dead AGENTS sprawled on the loading dock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What in God's name- ? Hellboy, Abe, Liz and Johann race past him, disappearing into the building. The alarm bells are deafening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD CORRIDOR 128 Hellboy leads the way down the corridors, which are alive with scrambling personnel. Several BPRD employees are lying on the floor, wounded and confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOBBY 129 The top-level human agents are clustered in the lobby, their guns drawn, all of them aiming at the Prince and his drooling bodyguards. Standoff. As Hellboy and the team arrive, Abe sees the Princess, her arms tied. Her brother holds her by the hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess! Without thinking, he darts forward. Instantly, one of the trolls swipes at him, its claws just missing his chest-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe! No, get back!! Abe regains his balance and tries again, his eyes glued to the desperate features of the beautiful young woman. Hellboy manages to restrain him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Sapien, don't! He'll kill you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll kill you all, if that's what you want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Why don't you just start with me? Hellboy strolls up to the Prince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You challenge-me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bet your ass I do-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your weapon of choice?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (holds up his massive hand) Five-fingered Mary. In the background, Manning arrives, wide-eyed. Just in time to see the Prince hand off his captive to one of the trolls. He drops back, flips his spear to horizontal and waits for Hellboy's attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy feints left, goes right and whips around, swinging his tail at the Prince. The Prince leaps and jabs with the spear, poking a hole in Hellboy's coat. The surrounding crowd backs away as the combatants circle each other. The Prince is nimble. The Prince is quick. He thrusts the spear again and again, driving Hellboy into a display case full of antique weapons. The glass breaks and a number of swords and axes fall to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) Arm yourself! Use the flail!.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not my style. Watch and learn, fish bowl. He punches the Prince, hard. The blow knocks the Prince to his knees; as he rises, Hellboy connects with a brutal combination. In the arms of the troll, the Princess' head rockets back and forth, as if struck. A moan of pain escapes from her lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (seeing this) H.B., no! Stop - you mustn't harm him! As the Prince totters, Hellboy turns to look at Abe, momentarily distracted- Then-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy grimaces and looks down: the Prince's SPEAR TIP is half-buried in his chest...! The Prince sneers and gives the spear a savage yank, breaking off the blade! Hellboy's eyes roll upward; Liz
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She and Johann manage to catch Hellboy as he collapses. The Prince reclaims the Princess and turns to the humans. His eyes seek out Abe, who has rushed to Hellboy's side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (showing off the Princess) If you want to see her again, you'll give me what's rightfully mine. Many people died for that crown. Bring it to me. He and his trolls escape into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MEDICAL BAY - LATER 131 Stretched out on an operating table, HB is barely conscious. Abe, in surgical goggles, probes the wound. In CLOSE-UP, Abe's webbed fingers lightly touch the glinting metal that protrudes from Hellboy's sternum. The spear tip responds, as if alive; it wriggles, producing a GROAN from
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Liz is near panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe, stop studying! Pull the friggin' thing out, why don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz, I'm sorry. It's a magical alloy. Every time I touch it, it moves closer to his heart. (GESTURING) Come here, I'll show you... Liz backs away, shaking her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I don't want to see it! (to Johann) We've got to do something!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cannot reverse the magic- we have to look for the Prince or somebody that can help Red.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go after that son-of-a-bitch and get him to reverse the spell!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll demand the gold piece-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So? We find it! We give it to him-!! Manning exchanges a worried look with a couple of his agents in the b.g.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PRINCESS' ROOM - MOMENTS LATER 132 Liz rummages in the Princess' quarters, throwing bedding around, opening drawers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONFERENCE ROOM - MOMENTS LATER Liz bursts into the conference room and starts shoving books and papers aside, hunting high and low.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD CONTROL ROOM - NIGHT Johann walks into the control room. In every screen a crisis situation is visible. JAGGED, BLURRY FOOTAGE shows a Yeti at large in Nebraska and a Plesiosaurus at large in Scotland, etc, etc-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lupgarou loose in Picadilly, a Winged creature nesting in a skyscraper- We have a situation in almost every point of the map. Johann looks back at a map with LED indicators signaling each crisis in the globe. They keep turning on a dozen a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Rebellion's spreading too fast- The only way to stop it is to stop the Prince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LIBRARY - NIGHT 135 Abe enters the dark, soaking library and surveys the ruins of his tank. He goes directly to one of the book stands, which lies in pieces on the floor. He comes up with his copy of "Jane Eyre." He opens it to Chapter 23 and finds the gold piece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any luck? Liz has come in behind him. Abe quickly palms the precious thing in his webbed hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It doesn't matter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No -?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Forget the gold piece. Let's us just find this royal asshole. (FIERCE) Fire and water, me and you, Abe. We'll kick his ass. Abe looks supremely troubled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe, let's do this for Red! Abe nods, unable to find a good answer. He manages to tuck the gold piece into his belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONFERENCE ROOM - LATER 136 Abe stands at a lectern. Behind him, a projected image of the Princess' map from the troll market. His finger traces the strange, elvish text.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The map contained within the cylinder seems useless- (BEAT) Now the case itself proves very useful- He moistens the holding cylinder case on a rubber stamp mat and imprints the surface pattern on the paper map. Glyphs and coordinates become visible. A silhouette of a twisted, gnarly tree is visible too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Renvyle it is- Both the Princess and her brother were born there. They hold it sacred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even if you're right, we sit tight and locate the gold piece, make sure he never ever gets his hands on it. If there's any truth to this legend, the fate of the world depends on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about Red?? Don't you care about him??? A moment of silence. Nobody knows what to say. Finally:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz. That may be his destiny. Manning is right: we can't take the chance. Liz glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see. Red was right about you. Welcome to the team, Johann. And goodbye. She leaves the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HB'S ROOM - LATER 137 Hellboy leans weakly against the doorway to his room. His cats purr all around him, oblivious to his pain. He sits by the bed. Liz enters the room. He smiles weakly at her-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Sparky- It's all going to be
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe stands nearby, in silence. Liz looks at him, teary-eyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll make it alright. Screw Manning- You are right, Liz- We should just do this together: the three of us. Liz smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PLANE - NIGHT 138 The BPRD airplane sits quietly in its hangar. In the passenger compartment, Hellboy climbs up. He looks up to see Liz smiling down at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COCKPIT - SAME 139 Abe's sitting in the pilot's seat, leafing through the massive airplane manual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Engine, starting- refer to NA-7488-BD... Liz climbs in behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We stay here much longer, we're gonna get caught...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a few more minutes. Here's an easy way to remember that "port" means "left." They each have four-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the door: it's Johann.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't try to stop us, Johann.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the contrary. I've been giving it some thought, and we should be able to save Hellboy. After all, the Prince lacks the gold crown. Without it, his army poses no threat. None at all. Abe is very quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in despair) Its useless- I- I- can't- I can't pilot this thing... Johann sits down in the co-pilot seat and melds with the controls...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll give it a try- Abe smiles at the sound of the engines starting up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD CORRIDOR - SAME Manning bangs on a vending machine in one of the BPRD corridors. As a dribble of hot coffee splatters into his cup, a couple of AGENTS run up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir - you'd better come, fast -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it - ow! He burns his fingers on the coffee as he hurries after the agents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HANGAR - MOMENTS LATER The BPRD airplane is ROARING, amid clouds of exhaust fumes. The plane spins around and around in tight circles, its wing tips knocking into ladders, lights and shelves. A bunch of agents are cowering in the doorway as Manning arrives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not ALL of them, it's not possible!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't that Johann at the controls?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure enough, they get a glimpse of the transparent head through the cockpit window. Abe's there, too. He raises a webbed hand to wave goodbye. The plane taxis outside onto the runway...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RUNWAY - NIGHT 142 .and takes off, barely under control, just missing the New Jersey treetops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Prince pulls the Princess through fractured, roaring tunnels. Here and there, the walls are pierced, allowing light and ocean waves to enter. Rounding a few corners, the Prince stops near a wall decorated with a large, elaborate FRESCO. It shows a stylized family tree, hunting scenes and naive renderings of trolls, faeries and ogres.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe this will help you remember who we are, who you are... What our destiny is- The Prince pushes his sister through a low doorway, out onto
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -overlooking a vast cavern, big as a stadium, lit by a thousand torches. The mechanical ARMY stands knee-deep in heaving seawater and foam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They - they - will be mine to command, whether you like it or not. Only after our victory will you appreciate my sacrifice... and yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD PLANE - DAY 145 The BPRD plane exits a bank of clouds and starts its descent upon an Irish island surrounded by the Atlantic Ocean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Massive granite mountains encircle an impossibly green valley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BPRD PLANE COCKPIT - DAY 146 Early sunlight washes over Hellboy's body, who weakly groans in Liz's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Liz) Where are we, Liz..?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Near the ocean, Red.We'regonna make you well here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .OPEN FIELD,IRELAND - DAY 147 148 SIGN:REYNVILLE,IRELAND. 148 The back doors of the cargo plane opens and out come Abe and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GREEN FIELD - DAY 149 Liz and Abe help Hellboy up to a gnarled TREE, twisted by eons of wind. Abe unfurls the map and points at a drawing of a similar, weird tree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This should be the portal. By all rights- Johann reaches the tree and inspects it carefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe, bring the mapcase over here. He's found a roundish SLOT in the tree, where the lowest branch joins the trunk. Abe slips the map back into its crystal cylinder and holds it alongside: it looks to be a perfect fit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Try it, Abe-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before you do anything... remember what we're in for. A world unlike anything we've ever known. Dangerous, deceptive...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're wasting time! Abe inserts and twists the cylinder. The tree comes to life, hauling its roots out of the ground, bending them into a swaying arch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dangerous, deceptive... and hard to leave. They walk under the tree roots, into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A transformed landscape. A perpetual nightland- Still overlooking the same ocean, but now throbbing with pale colors and twisted, Rackahm-esque contours. The men start down the hill, into a valley bordered by a rugged coastline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INLET - DAY 151 The team reaches the stony shore of a mile-wide inlet. Abe brings out the map.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pointing to the opposite shore) Renvyle is over there. They glance up and down the beach, looking for a boat. Hellboy blinks and sniffs the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: speaks up from an outcropping of rocks in the shallows directly in front of them. By his side, sitting atop of a tree: A SATYR and a CROW observe the group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I bid you welcome, strangers. Would you be seeking safe passage to Renvyle?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Can you help us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful, Liz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure you can come to an understanding! The Goblin heaves on an oar and emerges from behind the rocks. He's standing in the stern of a sturdy little coracle. Its wooden hull is painted in Celtic patterns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Room enough for all of you! (looks at Hellboy) Even your weary friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What will it cost, boatman? The Goblin smiles, displaying a disconcerting row of triangular teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, next to nothing! Make me an offer. Abe, Johann and Liz confer among themselves:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He won't want money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the goblin) I have a... belt!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johann removes his equipment belt, dangling it in front the creature's bat-like face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no use for such a thing. Liz shows him her binoculars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here... is a wonderful set of eyes, magic eyes that will bring the world-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I already have binoculars! No, I see something special. He points toward Hellboy's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Under his bandage - ! Quick as a squirrel, the creature hops to Hellboy's side and brings out a KNIFE! SWISH! In one sweep of the blade, he reveals HB's terrible wound, and the speartip protruding from it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That! (points at the steel) That - in exchange for your crossing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you touch it - ! She rushes to Hellboy's side, pushing the Goblin back, ready for a fight. The Goblin shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it so precious to you? Let me pull it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mustn't. One touch can kill him. The Goblin's eyes grow wide with understanding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. I see. We must go to the Angel of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll know what to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INLET - DAY 152 The tiny boat is a dot on the golden waves of the inlet as the Goblin rows them to the opposite shore and docks near a cove. The Goblin leads the way as Liz, Abe and Johann arrive and help Hellboy up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strange BIRDS hang upside down form the Cave's roof. A MASSIVE CHIMNEY has been carved out of the cave's rock at the other end. A Black, ancient figure is hunched there, warming its skeletal hands by the fire. A raspy voice utters something in an ancient language. The Goblin replies, gesturing at Hellboy, who collapses on the floor. In a deep coma, Hellboy lies on the floor, near the crackling fireplace. The ANGEL OF DEATH extends its FOUR BLACK WINGS and a thin, jagged smile appears in its pale, eyeless face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So. This one... The boy- I remember him well! Anung-un-Rama!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God. She knows - ?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I helped bring him into this world - in my fashion. It pulls a set of a glowing, red-hot TONGS out of the fire. It studies the speartip, which has buried itself deep in Hellboy's flesh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I warn you: it is his destiny to rule over the destruction of the Earth. Not now, not tomorrow - but some day. You are sure you want him to live?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I say yes-! Abe and Johann exchange a silent, worried look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well, then- but let it be said: The day will come when you will pay the price fire girl: This will bring you and the world much sorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I'll deal with it when that time comes. Now save him. The creature cackles and then grips the spear tip with the tongs. A cry of pain from Hellboy as it withdraws the bloody point from his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ANGEL OF DEATH holds up the speartip and looks at it with distaste.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harmless now. (looking at Hellboy) See - ? Hellboy's eyes flutter open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) Sleep now, child. Your strength, it will return. A guttural HISS from the corner: the Goblin is jumping up and down, pointing at the speartip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our ferry captain - he wants his payment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ach, outside with you! She tosses the speartip to the creature, who scoops it up and bounds out the door. instantly, the goblins and birds leap down and crowd around him, chattering in excitement over the latest prize. She gazes down at Hellboy, whose yellow eyes are fixed on her. He smiles wanly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .. HILLTOP - DAY 153 Alone on a hilltop, Abe surveys the coastline. Through the binoculars, he discerns a SECOND CAVE half-hidden behind wild, breaking waves. Glancing back at ANGEL OF DEATH's cave, Johann strikes off on his own, headed for the cave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HUT - DAY 154 Outside ANGEL OF DEATH's hut, a bandaged HB is sitting up, blinking in the sunlight. He sips some tea and gazes at Liz, who is happy now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I almost lost you- Hellboy smiles and grabs her hand-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you were mad at me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no one can stay mad forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry for all the attention, I thought it would be good for us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're never going to make them all happy, Red. What we have is ours and no one
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can turn my back on the world. I don't care anymore I don't- as long as you stay with me- as long as you think I'm still a good man. (BEAT ) Am I a good man, Liz?? Am I??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes you are. You are the best man I've ever met.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You still seem sad. Is there anything you want to tell me-??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, there is-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say it now, then. Whatever it is, I'm ready. (SIGHS) Is it about Johann-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No- no- what are you talking about?? Before she can go on, Johann appears. He carries a poultice and fresh rags.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe and I have found the entrance to the Golden Army's resting place- Liz come with us- (looks at Hellboy) You should stay behind and get some rest-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And call you in the morning, right?? Like Hell I will. I'm keeping an eye on you,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HILLS - DAY Johann, Liz and Hellboy follow a rugged trail along a bluff high over the sea. Johann refers to the map, then points to the cave opening a half-mile ahead. Abe is standing there,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There. Abe points at the violent sea below-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only way in- I'm afraid we'll have to jump in- (looks at Hellboy) Can you make it-? Hellboy nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strange. If this is the entrance-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know- Why isn't there more security?? With a ROAR, WINK!!!!! - jumps out and throws a CHAIN around Bellboy's neck! The chain is connected to his IRON MACE which now dangles around Hellboy's neck. The two creatures battle each other fiercely. WINK's MACE destroys a nearby tree, like a wrecking ball and it connects twice with Hellboy's head. But Red gets the upper hand quickly, snapping the chain in two and twirling the mace like a boleador.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He hits Wink again and again-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See?? It hurts!!! It hurts!!! Hellboy grips the chain, pulls the creature close, then, like a weightlifter, raises him high overhead. With a mighty
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy tosses him overboard. WINK hits the jagged rocks once- twice- thrice-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ouch- ouch- ouch- (looking around) We better go swimming before any more ugly fellas show up- He stares down into the swirling waters and discreetly takes his hand to his bandaged side: He's bleeding. The wound has re-opened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red, are you-?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't say a word, Blue- Let's move on-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johann plunges in from above, his body quickly tumbled by the rough seas. A moment later, Liz and Hellboy are in the water, too. Johann swims down, leading them into the darkness of the cave entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAVE ENTRANCE - SAME 157 As they bob up for air, they find there's only a few inches of breathing room between the sea and the rocky ceiling. Liz starts coughing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on, people. I'll be right back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Johann dives down to find a rusting, iron LOCK six feet under the surface. He tries to turn the control wheel, but can't make it budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seconds later, Hellboy is at his side, gripping the wheel in his huge hands. Using all his strength, Hellboy finally manages to turn it. His bandage, however, floats free... and his wound opens up, emitting a plume of blood. Lungs bursting, he shoots to the surface. Johann stays behind and swings open the lock, revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .carved from the living rock, leading upward into the depths of the cliff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LATER 160 The trio cautiously climbs the stairs, finding their way with light sticks. Hellboy stops to lean against the wall. He dabs at his chest with a rag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Johann) Hold up. We need to rest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Says who? I'm fine, I tell ya. He lurches forward, pushing past the others, fighting off his pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Johann) This was a mistake. He's -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mein Gott-- The stairs lead to-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CAVERN 161 -a vast underground arena where a thousand torches are flickering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to reveal rank upon rank of GOLDEN SOLDIERS. Immobile. Silent. Waiting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy leads the way down a row of gleaming statues, pausing to gaze up at the blank face of one of the infantrymen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, amigo. You got some gum? Two rows away, Johann examines the lethal weaponry that terminates the arms of each soldier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Most ingenious. A versatile, highly mobile killing machine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make that machines, Johann. I see more than one. Hellboy taps on a soldier's mechanical chest, which booms faintly, sending ECHOES up into the dark cavern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. You hear that? Listen - He thumps it, harder. The mechanical thing rocks backwards...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! The thing falls onto the soldier behind it! Then, - the ear-shattering noise of a hundred car wrecks builds as - a toppling LINE OF SOLDIERS races away like falling dominoes!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoops. The sound dwindles, then builds again as ANOTHER LINE of falling soldiers bears down on them!! Liz screams and Hellboy pulls her aside. The soldiers crash past them until - - the din suddenly stops. The PRINCE stands revealed at the head of the column.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As a boy, they say I enjoyed toy soldiers. So do you, I see. He strolls past the mechanical figures, pausing to kick aside some of the weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) You're bleeding. Most unfortunate. Hellboy wipes at his oozing chest wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Now it's your turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you envy these contraptions? They never bleed. They feel nothing. Not even the zest of combat. The Prince circles them, keeping an eye on Johann.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These fighting men are the very model of patience... merely awaiting word from their lawful commander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From his tunic, he brings forth two of the gold segments. he fits them together...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have the remaining piece, I presume.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We do not -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you are most foolish. He gestures to some troll GUARDS near a tunnel entrance. They lead the Princess out in chains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came here expecting what? Mercy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The death you would unleash will never happen! What you need is far from here and will stay out of your reach forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: reaches their ears from the tunnel entrance behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop - I have it. Abe, dripping wet, stands there, the last gold segment in the palm of his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here... For her... Take it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God. What has he done? Keeping his eyes on the Princess, Abe gives the gold piece to the Prince. Hellboy steps forward, feeling dizzy and betrayed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) You cannot fight him- not without hurting her... (BEAT ) What would you do if it was Liz??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Prince fits the gold parts together and places the resulting crown on his head!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Prince Nuada and I command my army to life once more. Does anyone dispute my right? With the deep sound of gears, ratchets and springs, the army comes to life. Up comes the lances and shields.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (points at the team) Kill them. Abe is now aghast, seeing the Prince drag his sister back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the Prince) That was your price!! A ransom, you said - paid in good faith!! (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (continued) (to Hellboy) Why, he lied to us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe old buddy. If we survive this, we need to talk. The Army swings into action, marching toward them. The four friends retreat, soon pressed against one of the walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He - he's a cad! Can you imagine, a highborn heir to the throne, last in a noble line of-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not now, Abe, okay? The first phalanx of golden soldiers is upon them, their terrifying weapons slashing in unison. Hellboy brings out his huge gun and starts firing as Johann grabs a torch and swings it like a club. A couple of the mechanical soldiers go down, only to pop back onto their feet, new weapons blossoming on their arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me - Liz summons up a white-hot burst of electrical fire in each hand. With a yell, she unleashes a searing EXPLOSION at the oncoming fighters. The shock wave rolls through the enemy ranks, flattening scores of soldiers. For a moment, the BPRD team regains hope... but the endless lines of mechanicals keep coming, marching on and over their scorched comrades. Hellboy holsters the Samaritan and rushes forward, giving it his best. His wound is running with fresh blood. He punches a soldier, whose mace pounds repeatedly against his ravaged chest; as blood spatters his face, Hellboy groans and keeps fighting, to absolutely no effect. At length, the mechanical arms throw Hellboy against the wall, where he collapses, unable to carry on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Invincibility!? So - the only one thing may stop them - Johann unzips his suit; with a HISSS, his ectoplasmic self flows out, into the body of the nearest mechanical soldier!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Instantly, the thing whirls on its companions and starts chopping! Bits and pieces of gold machinery fly about as Johann rips into the enemy!! But again, fresh metal soldiers fill in for the fallen. As the BPRD team watches in dismay, Johann's mechanical shell is surrounded by the other SOLDIERS, who methodically dismember it like marauding insects! As the parts drop to the floor, twitching and useless, Johann slithers out and re-inhabits his suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ach. They are too many. Anyone have another idea? Hellboy grabs the nearest sword and hauls himself to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a bellow) Prince Nuada: I challenge your right to command this army! With a soft BOOM, the clockwork troops come to a halt! All the mechanical heads turn toward the Prince, who stands on a ledge with his sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (follows HB) No= please- no- Hellboy moves away from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A challenge must be answered! Raise your sword!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A challenge from you? A nobody?? You are no one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!! He is Anung-un-Rma- son of the Fallen one- He has the right! Her eyes lock with Abe's: there's no other way. The Prince sees Hellboy coming and with a bitter smile picks up his sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well. (to the BPRD team) May his fate show you the cost of pride and blindness. As the hall rings with their first blows of their swords-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hellboy's too weak- Summoning up his last ounce of strength, Hellboy manages to drive the Prince back into the center of the arena, where they fight under the inscrutable gaze of the golden army. Every time Hellboy gets a clean shot at the Prince, Abe looks at him, pleading, and HB has no choice but to keep parrying off his enemy. Hellboy's sword grows heavy in his hands; he stares at it in dismay as it trembles. His muscles can no longer respond. The Prince is ready to kill him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (witness to a nightmare) No!! NO! ! A sudden movement at the ledge, where the Princess steps forward and... Using her concealed DAGGER, she STABS HERSELF in the right arm!! In silent slow motion, she drops the dagger. Instantly, the Prince drops his arm... his hands come away red with blood. He looks over at his sister. They share a hard look of mutual understanding. Love and hatred. Hellboy raises, through supreme effort, bleeding. He quickly raises his sword. The fight resumes, but this time, HB has the advantage. He fights bravely and after parrying fiercely with the Prince, he disarms him and points his sword at his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: have- won-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You have not-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He impales himself on HELLBOY's sword. The blade goes through his abdomen and protrudes on the other side. Hellboy pulls it out, but it's too late. Both the Prince and the Princess collapse to the ground, mortally wounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NO- Abe hurries to the Princess. Takes her into his arms, blinking in despair. The pale young creature is now a ghostly white. She lifts her eyes to Abe's, caressing his thin, scaly face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll find each other again, somewhere. And she dies in his arms. In the center of the arena:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hellboy) You... think you're any different from me? The humans - they will tire of you. They will disappoint you. And in the end, they will betray you. You... are living a lie. Your time will come again. May you make a better choice. Then, he, too, is dead. Both him and his sister turn to fine, pale dust. And the wind carries away the ashes from Abe's hands... Shaken, Hellboy lifts the crown from the Prince's head. Looks at it carefully, as if considering the possibilities. Suddenly, he rips it into pieces. As he crushes the first segement... . an entire division of the golden army collapses into a heap of scrap metal! Hellboy does the same with a second section of the crown and another massive division of the army tumbles into junk!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is about the tear up the last segment of the crown, when it explodes in his hands!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The last of the army disintegrates. Hellboy confronts the Prince's frightened troll guards:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the trolls) You - and your kind! Leave here. And stay in the shadows - where you belong. As the ogres slink back into the tunnels, Liz looks at Hellboy. He seems angry, stung by the Prince's last words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HILLS - DAY The BPRD team crosses waterfalls and stone bridges, through the magical hills. Liz walks at Hellboy's side, but he avoids her glance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TREE -- DAY They reach the strange, twisted tree. Johann takes the map cylinder and fits it into the slot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any last minute requests?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (very quiet) Do it, please. I - I'm ready for the real world now. Johann turns the cylinder. The tree roots form their arch... and the BPRD team walks through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . RENVYLE - DAY On the other side of the tree: Manning and a bunch of agents have set up spotter scopes and are gazing out over the countryside, looking for them. Suddenly, the team appears, literally from out of nowhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Where'd you come from? We were just-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, here to help. Well, I appreciate that Manning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abe steps past Hellboy and removes his gunbelt and equipment pack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Mr. Manning. I want to thank you, too. For all you've done for us over the years. He gives his stuff to the astonished agent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? What, exactly is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (walking away) I quit. Hellboy glances at Abe, then hauls out the Samaritan and shrugs off his pack, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. You're resigning?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks that way, doesn't it? Hellboy starts to leave, but spins around and takes his gun back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I'll keep this. He finally meets Liz's gaze. She crosses to him and takes him by the arm. She walks off with Hellboy and Abe, clinging tightly to the big, red daemon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liz -- not you, too!? (to Johann) They can't do this. Stop them, Johann-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Manning, you're an asshole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COASTLINE - DAY 166 Miles down the road, Abe stands on a promontory, staring off at the ocean, which blazes with golden reflections. Liz and HB sit next to each other on some mossy rocks. Overhead: blue sky, puffy white clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you said before - about us living
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean it! `Course, I'm thinking USA... but, hey - you decide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (breathing deep) Let's find a place in the country. Clean air - green hills - fresh milk from the farm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Milk? Yech.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A yard... With lots of room to grow in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (he looks blank) Grow? who gonna grow- ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our baby, that's who!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our b-? On Hellboy's immense grin: FREEZE FRAME. Roll CREDITS. At the end of the credits-
direction.name: direction
